name: F.L.A.G. The Néo Tournament
description:
Play as one of the nine fighters present and defend his colors during the Néo Tournament, F.L.A.G.
-The rules:
No HP bar, develop the best combo to take down your opponent and get his flag. If you get knocked down 4 times or get your flag taken, you lose the game.
-Game Controls:
Use the right, left and up arrows to move. Use the NumPad from 0 to 6 to perform the different attacks. Press the down arrow for the Special Move, and simultaneously press the down arrow and 8 (NumPad) for the Ultimate Special Move.
Most important, have fun through the different fighters and their sets of attacks and techniques as varied as each other.
Will you be able to defend your flag? The Neo Tournament is open!
